result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph C Kostka was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25.00 per month.  5 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph C Kostka

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Joseph C Kostka in court with attorney James J. Ermert.  Defendant Joseph C Kostka in custody.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Maggie Techert.  2nd eval done.  Dr Zimmel opines def is comp.  Def is ready to change plea.  Def rejects probation.
COP filed.
P - G
BTC:  Guilty
State rec:  CFTS; CC since def is rejecting probation.
BTC:  CFTS
CC
PPP $25/mo begin 5-1-15
FTP:  5 days
Competency hearing on March 16, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Joseph C Kostka in court with attorney James J. Ermert.  Defendant Joseph C Kostka in custody.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court Reporter: Maggie Techert.  Reviewed report.  Stip to competency.  State rec:  CFTS.  Family also present & want def to get help.   Atty to contact Corp Counsel.
BTC:  Set over to next week.  Need a second report.  Another comp eval is ordered.  Competency hearing scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Examine scheduled in RCJ on 2/20/15 w/ Dr. Pankiewicz
Competency hearing on March 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim, RG (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Joseph C Kostka in court with attorney Gretchen G. Rosenke.  Defendant Joseph C Kostka in custody.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set. Compentency is raised. 
BTC: Comp eval ordered.   Competency hearing scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
